overview:
JD is founder and CEO (Creative Entrepreneurial Officer) of meebee.com.

He is a serial entrepreneur and internet visionary having created numerous world firsts for the internet and mobile market, including the world’s first mobile social networking service.

JD was born an entrepreneur, starting his first business as a child, and then in college, helping launch two successful food franchises in Australia. In 2002, he played a key role in an internet startup that was successfully sold to a leading public company. Though raised in Australia, currently based in Europe, JD was at one time, a famous TV personality in Japan. JD has over 20 years experience in the Japanese market, and is fluent in Japanese. With his latest venture, meebee, JD is looking to change the world by helping people save time and minimize hassle when arranging to meet.
